text: @DWUhlfelderLaw Daniel, I thought covid-19 was over judging by the news. I haven't seen any in the last 10 days. While I support 100% the black lives matter movement and protests, it is doing America a grave disservice by not keeping the covid-19 statistics in the forefront.
